mapper.sql: select sale_id, sale_no, sale_time, sale_user_id, sale_split_type, support_buy_type, sale_amount, sale_amount_without_commission, commission_amount, remain_amount, split_min_rate, split_max_rate, single_buy_max_amount, status, urgent_sale_flg, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_sale_coin
mapper.insert: insert into sys_sale_coin( sale_no, sale_user_id, sale_split_type, support_buy_type, sale_amount, sale_amount_without_commission, commission_amount, remain_amount, split_min_rate, split_max_rate, single_buy_max_amount, status, urgent_sale_flg, create_by, remark, sale_time, create_time )values( #{saleNo}, #{saleUserId}, #{saleSplitType}, #{supportBuyType}, #{saleAmount}, #{saleAmountWithoutCommission}, #{commissionAmount}, #{remainAmount}, #{splitMinRate}, #{splitMaxRate}, #{singleBuyMaxAmount}, #{status}, #{urgentSaleFlg}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_sale_coin where sale_id in
#{saleId}
